snippet: Joseph J. Kennedy, the company’s chief since 2004, suggested he needed a rest after 10 years on the job, though he said he would stay till a successor was found.
abstract: Joseph J. Kennedy, the company’s chief since 2004, suggested he needed a rest after 10 years on the job, though he said he would stay till a successor was found.

headline.main: Chief Executive at Pandora Media to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Chief Executive at Pandora Media to Step Down
